title: Need 10 more rp
body:
So i just got PROJECT Yasuo on my shop -50% discount with 675 RP and i want to buy championship riven with 975 but if i buy it then i am left with 665 rp and for 10 i cant buy the yasuo's skin. that sucks...


P.S. Riot please give me 10rp because i am not in a position to spend 5 more $ for 10 rp so please give me 10 rp 


I am on EUNE and name PET3R13 .  Thank you for your attention

replies.body: Hey, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  We may be able to work something out there.  :D
OK i sent it,be sure to check it out
I have sent it but no response =..=
